collisionAreasVisible - Static variable in class sprites.S4P
If you want to see the collision area for the sprites then set to tru.
This should only be done when testing collision detection because it uses a lot of memory creatin images for pixel-pixel collision areas which is not released even if this is set back to false.

S4P - Class in sprites

SMessenger - Class in sprites
 
SMessenger() - Constructor for class sprites.SMessenger
 
sortZorder() - Static method in class sprites.S4P
Sorts the sprites so they are drawn in z order
Lower Z order values are drawn first.
Sprite - Class in sprites
This class represents a sprite based upon a bitmap image file (eg jpeg, gif, png)
It provides methods to set the sprite's position, velocity, acceleration, scale and rotation.
Sprite(PApplet, String, int) - Constructor for class sprites.Sprite
Create a sprite based on an image file You can specify the order the sprites are drawn using zOrder - the higher the value the nearer the viewer.
Sprite(PApplet, String, String, int) - Constructor for class sprites.Sprite
Create a sprite based on an image file and an alphaMask file.
Sprite(PApplet, String, int, int, int) - Constructor for class sprites.Sprite
Create a sprite based on an image file.
Sprite(PApplet, String, String, int, int, int) - Constructor for class sprites.Sprite
Create a sprite based on an image file and an alphaMask file.
